tool.name: Ensemble
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the bioml Ensemble module.

param.name: input_excel
param.label: input XLSX file
param.help: The file to where the selected features are saved in excel format. Format: [input].XLSX

param.name: sheets
param.label: input STRING file
param.help: Names or index of the selected sheets for both features and hyperparameters. Format: [input].STRING

param.name: label
param.label: input CSV file
param.help: The path to the labels of the training set in a csv format. Format: [input].CSV

param.name: outname_ensemble_output
param.label: output ZIP name
param.help: The zip file to the output for the ensemble results Format: [output].ZIP

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: prediction_threshold
param.label: prediction_threshold
param.help: Between 0.5 and 1 and determines what considers to be a positive prediction, if 1 only those predictions where all models agrees are considered to be positive.

param.name: num_thread
param.label: num_thread
param.help: The number of threads to use for the parallelization of outlier detection.

param.name: precision_weight
param.label: precision_weight
param.help: Weights to specify how relevant is the precision for the ranking of the different features.

param.name: recall_weight
param.label: recall_weight
param.help: Weights to specify how relevant is the recall for the ranking of the different features.

param.name: class0_weight
param.label: class0_weight
param.help: Weights to specify how relevant is the f1, precision and recall scores of the class 0 or the negative class for the ranking of the different features with respect to class 1 or the positive class

param.name: report_weight
param.label: report_weight
param.help: Weights to specify how relevant is the f1, precision and recall for the ranking of the different features with respect to MCC which is a more general measures of the performance of a model

param.name: difference_weight
param.label: difference_weight
param.help: How important is to have similar training and test metrics.

param.name: kfold_parameters
param.label: kfold_parameters
param.help: The parameters for the kfold in num_split:test_size format.

param.name: label
param.label: label
param.help: The path to the labels of the training set in a csv format.

param.name: scaler
param.label: scaler
param.help: Choose one of the scaler available in scikit-learn, defaults to RobustScaler.

param.name: outliers
param.label: outliers
param.help: A list of outliers if any, the name should be the same as in the excel file with the filtered features, you can also specify the path to a file in plain text format, each record should be in a new line.
